title: Games failing to start
body:
^Title^
{{item:3070}}

Started approx 12:14 am Eastern for me.  Was previously playing just fine. 

Last edit I swear.  Add Client lag and disconnects from client due to unknown server error to the list.

replies.body: There was some server instability on NA last night and ranked queues were disabled.  There was also some downtime for maintenance, but everything should be good to go now.  Please let me know if you still have any issues getting back in!

I was having a similar issue last night, from midnight to like 1am central...gave up and went to bed, woke up at the back end of the maintenance, came back now, and cannot log in, it makes it to password authentication the first "clear" sound, then spins for a minute, before telling me it couldnt log in

so i can log in but when i do, it is saying that I am still in game...from a game that i finished. It wouldn't let me see the stats but the game finished....And my hubby just bought me a new skin and I want to try it out!

Logged in after a hefty time of queue position 1  -__-   and it seems for me at least first attempt is going to work.  Count down hit zero and disconnected from pvp but Reconnect to game appeared and I am successfully in the game now.
